TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageReceiver extends Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.ClientEntity implements class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Core.IMessageReceiver, class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Core.IReceiverClient, class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.IClientEntity

Docs.summary: The MessageReceiver can be used to receive messages from Queues and Subscriptions.
Docs.remarks: The MessageReceiver provides advanced functionality that is not found in the or . For instance, , which allows you to receive messages on demand, but also requires you to manually renew locks using .
